ygData.subject: Re: Denied Access?
ygData.msgSnippet: Half elven scum!  Like they would block a race from a mailing list... cmon people think!  Any Necromancers that have a better description of what the spells,
ygData.messageBody:
Half elven scum! Like they would block a race from a mailing list... cmon
people think! Any Necromancers that have a better description of what the
spells, and which spells are a waste of money? Take vampiric embrace... is
it worth the damn money at 8th level?

Thanks,

Wombat / Dark Elven Necromancer
